statements: SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_data;
SELECT policyholder_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE policyholder_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE policyholder_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY claim_date ASC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, policyholder_id FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY policyholder_id ASC, claim_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE policyholder_id = '345e6789-e12b-12d3-a457-426614178900' AND claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_claims, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM policyholders WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, policyholder_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE policyholder_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policyholder_id, first_name, last_name FROM policyholders WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE policyholder_id = 100 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, c.claim_amount FROM policyholders p INNER JOIN claims c ON p.policyholder_id = c.policyholder_id WHERE c.claim_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;

SELECT p.first_name AS policyholder_fname, c.claim_amount AS amount, c.claim_date AS date FROM policyholders p JOIN claims c ON p.policyholder_id = c.policyholder_id WHERE c.claim_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_address FROM Policyholders ORDER BY policyholder_name DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_phone FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT policyholder_name, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Policyholders INNER JOIN Claims ON Policyholders.policyholder_id = Claims.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_address FROM Policyholders;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_address, policyholder_phone FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_address, policyholder_phone FROM Policyholders ORDER BY policyholder_name DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM Policyholders JOIN Claims ON Policyholders.policyholder_id = Claims.policyholder_id GROUP BY policyholder_name;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE policyholder_id = 2 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT description, status FROM ClaimDetails WHERE claim_id = 3 AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT Claims.claim_id, ClaimDetails.description FROM Claims JOIN ClaimDetails ON Claims.claim_id = ClaimDetails.claim_id;

SELECT Policyholders.name, SUM(Payments.amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM Policyholders JOIN Claims ON Policyholders.policyholder_id = Claims.policyholder_id JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id GROUP BY Policyholders.name;
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policyholder_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Policyholders;
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM InsuranceCompanies;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 3
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE company_id = 2
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE policyholder_id = 5 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT status_name FROM ClaimStatus
